text: Ami amara nidarsanasamuha hate taderake phiriye rakhi, yara prthibite an'yayabhabe garba kare. Yadi tara samasta nidarsana pratyaksa kare phele, tabu'o ta bisbasa karabe na. Ara yadi hedayetera patha dekhe, tabe se patha grahana kare na. Athaca gomarahira patha dekhale ta'i grahana kare neya. Era karana, tara amara nidarsanasamuhake mithya bale mane kareche ebam ta theke bekhabara raye geche.
